title: International Women’s Day 2021: A conversation about heavy menstrual bleeding and sport with Olympian Kayla Imrie
description: Kayla Imrie competes in the canoe sprint for New Zealand. Ashlee caught up with the three-time world championship medallist to chat about how her condition, menorrhagia, affects her competitive life as an elite athlete.
